title: Interactive Submodular Set Cover
abstract: We introduce a natural generalization of submodular set cover and exact active learning with a finite hypothesis class (query learning). We call this new problem interactive submodular set cover. Applications include advertising in social networks with hidden information. We give an approximation guarantee for a greedy algorithm and give a hardness of approximation result which matches up to constant factors. We also discuss the adaptivity gap for the problem and present encouraging early experimental results.
